title: [Rambling Meadows, Orchard]
description: Squatting under the skeletal branches of two dead fruit trees, a round stone cistern oozes water from a large crack in its side.

Squatting under the skeletal branches of two dead fruit trees, a round stone cistern oozes water from a large crack in its side.  Covered with a badly warped oak-paneled roof and coated with a thick growth of moss, the cistern appears to be fed from an underground spring, although it quickly loses the water it gains through the damage in its exterior wall.  Long-bladed grasses feed off the escaping water, growing strong and lush around the base of the stone container.

Squatting under the skeletal branches of two dead fruit trees, a round stone cistern oozes water from a large crack in its side.  Covered with a badly warped oak-paneled roof and coated with a thick growth of deep green moss, the cistern appears to be fed from an underground spring, although it quickly loses the water it gains through the damage in its exterior wall.  Long-bladed grasses feed off the escaping water, growing strong and lush around the base of the stone container.
